text:
Hey @manjitkm.3210 - hope you are well girly!

Just a thought, but my cousin is doing a Higher Apprenticeship with Barclays bank in relationships management ... it's a role where he gets to interact with clients and gets paid quite well and they pay for you to do a degree. Thought it might be interesting to you as its a little bit business, a little bit marketing / sales, which you said you might like! Just an idea

Here is a link to the government website to browse all apprenticehips in UK by industry (click on the "browse" tab) >> <https://www.findapprenticeship.service.gov.uk/apprenticeshipsearch?searchMode=Category>

attachments.title: Find an apprenticeship
attachments.text: Weâ€™ve introduced a new way to find and apply for an apprenticeship in England.

text: Heyyy ive seen a few apprenticeships but theres not much apprenticeships near me and i dont want to travel far. And there are very few degree apprenticeships which is something i want to do
